current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:
To amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act to adjust the Crooked River boundary, to provide water
			 certainty for the City of Prineville, Oregon, and for other purposes.

committee-name.#text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
